body:
It's hard to know but perhaps an upgrade of django-rest-framework might solve this. 

Oh my! We're on 3.6.2 and [a LOT has changed between that and 3.7.7](http://www.django-rest-framework.org/topics/release-notes/)

Perhaps we should park this issue and instead file a new one about not being so behind on django-rest-framework anyway.
